Differentiation.pm

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #
00002 #  Extend differentiation to multiple variables
00003 #  Check differentiation for complex functions
00004 #  Do derivatives for norm and unit.
00005 #
00006 #  Make shortcuts for getting numbers 1, 2, and sqrt, etc.
00007 #
00008 
00009 ##################################################
00010 #
00011 #  Differentiate the formula in terms of the given variable(s)
00012 #
00013 sub Parser::D {
00014   my $self = shift;
00015   my $d; my @x = @_; my $x;
00016   if (defined($x[0]) && $x[0] =~ m/^\d+$/) {
00017     $d = shift(@x);
00018     $self->Error("You can only specify one variable when you give a derivative count")
00019       unless scalar(@x) <= 1;
00020     return($self) if $d == 0;
00021   }
00022   if (scalar(@x) == 0) {
00023     my @vars = keys(%{$self->{variables}});
00024     my $n = scalar(@vars);
00025     if ($n == 0) {
00026       return $self->new('0') if $self->{isNumber};
00027       $x = 'x';
00028     } else {
00029       $self->Error("You must specify a variable to differentiate by") unless $n == 1;
00030       $x = $vars[0];
00031     }
00032     CORE::push(@x,$x);
00033   }
00034   @x = ($x[0]) x $d if $d;
00035   my $f = $self->{tree};
00036   foreach $x (@x) {
00037     return $self->new('0') unless defined $self->{variables}{$x};
00038     $f = $f->D($x);
00039   }
00040   return $self->new($f);
00041 }
00042 
00043 #
00044 #  Overridden by the classes that DO implement differentiation
00045 #
00046 sub Item::D {
00047   my $self = shift;
00048   my $type = ref($self); $type =~ s/.*:://;
00049   $self->Error("Differentiation for '%s' is not implemented",$type);
00050 }

00058 sub Parser::BOP::add::D {
00059   my $self = shift; my $x = shift;
00060   $self = $self->Item("BOP")->new(
00061     $self->{equation},$self->{bop},
00062     $self->{lop}->D($x),$self->{rop}->D($x)
00063   );
00064   return $self->reduce;
00065 }

00077 sub Parser::BOP::multiply::D {
00078   my $self = shift; my $x = shift;
00079   my $equation = $self->{equation};
00080   my $BOP = $self->Item("BOP");
00081   $self =
00082     $BOP->new($equation,'+',
00083       $BOP->new($equation,$self->{bop},
00084         $self->{lop}->D($x),$self->{rop}->copy($equation)),
00085       $BOP->new($equation,$self->{bop},
00086         $self->{lop}->copy($equation),$self->{rop}->D($x))
00087     );
00088   return $self->reduce;
00089 }
00090 
00091 sub Parser::BOP::divide::D {
00092   my $self = shift; my $x = shift;
00093   my $equation = $self->{equation};
00094   my $BOP = $self->Item("BOP");
00095   $self =
00096     $BOP->new($equation,$self->{bop},
00097       $BOP->new($equation,'-',
00098         $BOP->new($equation,'*',
00099           $self->{lop}->D($x),$self->{rop}->copy($equation)),
00100         $BOP->new($equation,'*',
00101           $self->{lop}->copy($equation),$self->{rop}->D($x))
00102       ),
00103       $BOP->new($equation,'^',$self->{rop},$self->Item("Number")->new($equation,2))
00104     );
00105   return $self->reduce;
00106 }
00107 
00108 sub Parser::BOP::power::D {
00109   my $self = shift; my $x = shift;
00110   my $equation = $self->{equation};
00111   my $BOP = $self->Item("BOP");
00112   my $FN = $self->Item("Function");
00113   my $vars = $self->{rop}->getVariables;
00114   if (defined($vars->{$x})) {
00115     $vars = $self->{lop}->getVariables;
00116     if (defined($vars->{$x})) {
00117       $self =
00118         $FN->new($equation,'exp',
00119           [$BOP->new($equation,'*',$self->{rop}->copy($equation),
00120             $FN->new($equation,'ln',[$self->{lop}->copy($equation)],0))]);
00121        return $self->D($x);
00122     }
00123     $self = $BOP->new($equation,'*',
00124       $FN->new($equation,'ln',[$self->{lop}->copy($equation)],0),
00125       $BOP->new($equation,'*',$self->copy($equation),$self->{rop}->D($x))
00126     );
00127   } else {
00128     $self =
00129       $BOP->new($equation,'*',
00130         $BOP->new($equation,'*',
00131           $self->{rop}->copy($equation),
00132           $BOP->new($equation,$self->{bop},
00133             $self->{lop}->copy($equation),
00134             $BOP->new($equation,'-',
00135               $self->{rop}->copy($equation),
00136               $self->Item("Number")->new($equation,1)
00137             )
00138           )
00139         ),
00140         $self->{lop}->D($x)
00141       );
00142   }
00143   return $self->reduce;
00144 }

00172 sub Parser::Function::D_chain {
00173   my $self = shift; my $x = $self->{params}[0];
00174   my $name = "D_" . $self->{name};
00175   $self = $self->Item("BOP")->new($self->{equation},'*',$self->$name($x->copy),$x->D(shift));
00176   return $self->reduce;
00177 }

00532 sub Parser::Function::numeric::D_ln {

00538 sub Parser::Function::numeric::D_log {
00539   my $self = shift;
00540   my $base10 = $self->{equation}{context}{flags}{useBaseTenLog};
00541   if ($base10) {return $self->D_log10(@_)} else {return $self->D_ln(@_)}
00542 }
00543 
00544 sub Parser::Function::numeric::D_log10 {
00545   my $self = shift; my $x = shift;
00546   my $equation = $self->{equation};
00547   my $BOP = $self->Item("BOP");
00548   my $NUM = $self->Item("Number");
00549   return
00550     $BOP->new($equation,'/',
00551       $NUM->new($equation,1),
00552       $BOP->new($equation,'*',
00553         $NUM->new($equation,CORE::log(10)), $x
00554       )
00555     );
00556 }

00589 sub Parser::List::D {
00590   my $self = shift; my $x = shift;
00591   $self = $self->copy($self->{equation});
00592   foreach my $f (@{$self->{coords}}) {$f = $f->D($x)}
00593   return $self->reduce;
00594 }

00597 sub Parser::List::Interval::D {
00598   my $self = shift;
00599   $self->Error("Can't differentiate intervals");
00600 }
00601 
00602 sub Parser::List::AbsoluteValue::D {
00603   my $self = shift; my $x = $self->{coords}[0]->copy;
00604   my $equation = $self->{equation};
00605   my $BOP = $self->Item("BOP");
00606   return
00607     $BOP->new($equation,"*",
00608       $BOP->new($equation,'/', $x, $self->copy),
00609       $x->D(shift),
00610    );
00611 }

00630 sub Parser::Constant::D {
00631   my $self = shift; my $x = shift;
00632   return $self->{def}{value}{tree}->D($x) if Value::isFormula($self->{def}{value});
00633   $self->Item("Number")->new($self->{equation},0);
00634 }
00635 
00636 #########################################################################
00637 
00638 sub Parser::Value::D {
00639   my $self = shift; my $x = shift; my $equation = $self->{equation};
00640   return $self->Item("Value")->new($equation,$self->{value}->D($x));
00641 }
00642 
00643 sub Value::D {
00644   my $self = shift; my $x = shift;
00645   my @coords = $self->value;
00646   foreach my $n (@coords)
00647     {if (ref($n) eq "") {$n = 0} else {$n = $n->D($x)->value}}
00648   return $self->new(@coords);
00649 }
00650 
00651 sub Value::List::D {
00652   my $self = shift; my $x = shift;
00653   my @coords = $self->value;
00654   foreach my $n (@coords)
00655     {if (ref($n) eq "") {$n = 0} else {$n = $n->D($x)}}
00656   return $self->new([@coords]);
00657 }
00658 
00659 sub Value::Interval::D {
00660   shift; shift; my $self = shift;
00661   $self->Error("Can't differentiate intervals");
00662 }
00663 
00664 sub Value::Set::D {
00665   shift; shift; my $self = shift;
00666   $self->Error("Can't differentiate sets");
00667 }
00668 
00669 sub Value::Union::D {
00670   shift; shift; my $self = shift;
00671   $self->Error("Can't differentiate unions");
00672 }
00673 
00674 #########################################################################
00675 
00676 sub Parser::Variable::D {
00677   my $self = shift; my $x = shift;
00678   my $d = ($self->{name} eq $x)? 1: 0;
00679   return $self->Item("Number")->new($self->{equation},$d);
00680 }
00681 
00682 #########################################################################
00683 
00684 sub Parser::String::D {
00685   my $self = shift;
00686   $self->Item("Number")->new($self->{equation},0);
00687 }
